title: Fan
provenance_text:
(Tiffany & Co., New York, NY); purchased by Emilie Grigsby [1879-1964], New York, NY and London, England, until January 1912 [1]; (sold at Anderson Auction Company, New York, NY, January 27, 1912?) [2]; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, January 27, 1912?; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] This name is recorded as Emily, Emelie, and Emilie in various sources. [2] While documentation from Herbert DuPuy suggests that he purchased this fan on January 27, 1912, the auction catalog lists this item as being sold on January 23, 1912 as lot 498.
